text: The 2019–20 season was the 63rd season of Unione Calcio Sampdoria in the Serie A, and their 8th consecutive season in the top-flight. The club competed in Serie A and the Coppa Italia. Former Sassuolo and Roma coach Eusebio Di Francesco replaced Marco Giampaolo as head coach on 22 June 2019, with Giampaolo moving to Milan on 19 June. ==Players== ===Squad information=== :Appearances
